title: Harvest Money: Farming indigenous chicken for profit

subtasks: Disinfecting visitors before entering the farm
Managing parent stock and chicks in a biosecure environment
Feeding young local chickens a specialized diet
Protecting chicks from diseases through early detection and treatment
Translating educational content from the video might also involve accounting and sports management but not directly related to farming, so these are excluded.

tasks.task: Selling Local Chickens at Higher Prices
subtasks: Monitoring and managing growth during critical early weeks
Adapting to market demand and pricing challenges
